product_name: Patagonia Reversible Puff-Ball Bunting - Toddler Boys'
long_description: When the cold, winter winds blow, keep your toddler boy warm, comfortable and happy in the Patagonia Reversible Puff-Ball bunting. Recycled polyester fabric with Durable Water Repellent treatment resists snags and moisture. 90% recycled Thermogreen(R) insulation uses special thermally-bonded fibers to provide a high level of warmth with minimal weight. Spandex trim around hood, sleeves and leg cuffs helps retain heat; hand covers allow full extension of little arms. Easy-entry front zipper with draft flap won't let heat sneak out; it opens wide for easy dressing. Reversible design with contrasting quilt stitching offers a change of pace. The Patagonia Reversible Puff-Ball bunting has a relaxed fit to accommodate layers. 100% recyclable through Patagonia's Common Threads Recycling Program-simply return your worn-out item to Patagonia.
